name: Extreme Military Offroad
description:
Drive a mighty truck in a new driving simulator - Extreme Military Offroad

Go offroad - where true extreme driving begins. Simulator offers lots of challenges for your cars . Reach the destination, drive wherever wanted in Extreme Military Offroad. Missions will add more challenge, but a true military driver can drive despite everything! Drive your wheels through any challenges of truck simulator.

Extreme Military Offroad features:

- Military truck driving simulator
- Upgrades for your cars
- Extreme cars: monster truck, truck, and SUV
- Challenging missions
- Extreme driving conditions
- Mud physics
- Day and weather cycles
- Cool sound and visuals

Driving extreme!
Get your wheels away from city cars and road to the military offoroad polygon! Military offroad simulator is no place for puny cars. Drive extreme military truck through offroad. In truck driving simulator you should be smart. Discover offroad driving with Extreme Military Offroad - drive extreme cars in extreme simulator.

Cars to choose!
Driving without enemy cars is still extreme and challenging. Upgrade your military truck to master the offroad - strong truck can be stronger. All cars have specific offroad missions. Offroad is for extreme driving on some mighty cars or truck. Drive military cars and challenge the simulator!

Offroad simulator!
Drive giant cars for sheer joy in truck driving simulator! Offroad driving is about reaching destination on your wheels. Every military driver must pass the challenge of extreme offroad! Drive military SUV, truck, or monster truck and forget other cars. Offroad will put your wheels to the test. Drive in our offroad driving simulator!

Tough cars await in our truly military driving simulator! Time for some extreme driving in Extreme Military Offroad!
